Package nl.esciencecenter.neon.noise

Noise-generation related functionality, like Perlin noise for heightmap textures.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ImprovedPerlinNoise
    Improved perlin noise generator , see http://mrl.nyu.edu/~perlin/noise/
    NewNoise
    Currently unused class, stored for reference.
    Noise
    Noise creation class for visual effects.
    Perlin2D
    3-Dimensional Perlin Noise Texture.
    Perlin3D
    3-Dimensional Perlin Noise Texture.

Package nl.esciencecenter.neon.noise Description

Noise-generation related functionality, like Perlin noise for heightmap textures.
